+import React from "react";
+import { Flex } from "@react-native-material/core";
+import { Text } from "react-native";
+import { View } from "react-native-web";
+import { StyleSheet } from "react-native";
+export default function Task() {
+  return (
+    <Flex
+    style={styles.container}
+    >
+        <Text> TaskS</Text>
+    <View style={styles.accordionItem}>
+      <View
+        style={styles.accordionHeader}
+        // key={pdata.id}
+        // You can handle the collapse behavior using state or a library like `react-native-collapsible`
+      >
+        <View style={styles.meAuto}>
+          <View style={styles.headerInner}>
+            <Text style={styles.projectName}>Project name here</Text>
+            <Text style={styles.status}>
+              Status:
+              <Text style={styles.statusBadge}>In Progress</Text>
+            </Text>
+            <Text style={styles.priorityBadge}>High</Text>
+          </View>
+        </View>
+      </View>
+      {/* The content inside the collapsed section */}
+      {/* Replace <TaskList /> with the actual component */}
+      <View style={styles.accordionBody}>
+        {/* <TaskList /> */}
+      </View>
+    </View>
+    </Flex>
+  );
+}
+let styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: {
+    width: "100%",
+    flexDirection: "row",
+    alignItems: "flex-start",
+    justifyContent: "space-between",
+    gap: "10px",
+    height: "calc(100vh - 128px)",
+    padding: "10px",
+    flexWrap: "wrap",
+    overflow: "scroll",
+    marginTop: "64px",
+  },
+   accordionItem: {
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#ccc',
+    borderRadius: 8,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+  },
+  accordionHeader: {
+    padding: 10,
+    backgroundColor: '#f0f0f0',
+    borderTopLeftRadius: 8,
+    borderTopRightRadius: 8,
+  },
+  meAuto: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  headerInner: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  projectName: {
+    fontSize: 16,
+    fontWeight: 'bold',
+    color: 'black',
+  },
+  status: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: 'black',
+    marginLeft: 10,
+  },
+  statusBadge: {
+    marginLeft: 5,
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: 'green', // Change to the desired color
+  },
+  priorityBadge: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: 'blue', // Change to the desired color
+  },
+  accordionBody: {
+    padding: 10,
+    backgroundColor: 'white',
+    borderBottomLeftRadius: 8,
+    borderBottomRightRadius: 8,
+  },
+});

@@ -0,0 +1,119 @@
+import React from "react";
+import { Flex } from "@react-native-material/core";
+import { Text } from "react-native";
+import { View } from "react-native-web";
+import { StyleSheet } from "react-native";
+export default function Task() {
+  return (
+    <Flex
+    style={styles.container}
+    >
+     <View style={styles.contentBody}>
+      <View style={styles.container}>
+        <View style={styles.textHead}>
+          <Text style={styles.heading}>Task Management</Text>
+          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.addButton}>
+            <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Add New Task</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+        </View>
+        <View style={styles.row}>
+          <View style={styles.col}>
+            <View style={styles.accordionContainer}>
+              {/* {pjson.projects.map((pdata) => ( */}
+                <View style={styles.accordionItem}
+                //  key={pdata.id}
+                 >
+                  <TouchableOpacity
+                    style={styles.accordionHeader}
+                    onPress={() => {
+                      // Handle accordion header press here
+                    }}
+                  >
+                    <View style={styles.meAuto}>
+                      <View style={styles.headerInner}>
+                        <Text style={styles.projectName}>Project name here</Text>
+                        <Text style={styles.status}>
+                          Status:
+                          <Text style={styles.statusBadge}>In Progress</Text>
+                        </Text>
+                        <Text style={styles.priorityBadge}>High</Text>
+                      </View>
+                    </View>
+                  </TouchableOpacity>
+                  {/* The content inside the collapsed section */}
+                  {/* Replace <TaskList /> with the actual component */}
+                  <View style={styles.accordionBody}>
+                    {/* <TaskList /> */}
+                  </View>
+                </View>
+              {/* ))} */}
+            </View>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.col}></View>
+        </View>
+      </View>
+    </View>
+    </Flex>
+  );
+}
+let styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  container: {
+    width: "100%",
+    flexDirection: "row",
+    alignItems: "flex-start",
+    justifyContent: "space-between",
+    gap: "10px",
+    height: "calc(100vh - 128px)",
+    padding: "10px",
+    flexWrap: "wrap",
+    overflow: "scroll",
+    marginTop: "64px",
+  },
+   accordionItem: {
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: '#ccc',
+    borderRadius: 8,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+  },
+  accordionHeader: {
+    padding: 10,
+    backgroundColor: '#f0f0f0',
+    borderTopLeftRadius: 8,
+    borderTopRightRadius: 8,
+  },
+  meAuto: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  headerInner: {
+    flexDirection: 'row',
+    justifyContent: 'space-between',
+    alignItems: 'center',
+  },
+  projectName: {
+    fontSize: 16,
+    fontWeight: 'bold',
+    color: 'black',
+  },
+  status: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: 'black',
+    marginLeft: 10,
+  },
+  statusBadge: {
+    marginLeft: 5,
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: 'green', // Change to the desired color
+  },
+  priorityBadge: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: 'blue', // Change to the desired color
+  },
+  accordionBody: {
+    padding: 10,
+    backgroundColor: 'white',
+    borderBottomLeftRadius: 8,
+    borderBottomRightRadius: 8,
+  },
+});

+                      <Text style={styles.priorityBadge}>High</Text>

+                </TouchableOpacity>

+              </View>

+            </View>

+export default Task;

+import React from "react";
+import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, StyleSheet } from "react-native";
+
+const Task = () => {
+  return (
+    <View style={styles.contentBody}>
+      <View style={styles.container}>
+        <View style={styles.textHead}>
+          <Text style={styles.heading}>Task Management</Text>
+          <TouchableOpacity style={styles.addButton}>
+            <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Add New Task</Text>
+          </TouchableOpacity>
+        </View>
+        <View >
+          <View >
+            <View style={styles.accordionContainer}>
+              {/* {pjson.projects.map((pdata) => ( */}
+              <View
+                style={styles.accordionItem}
+                //  key={pdata.id}
+              >
+                <TouchableOpacity
+                  style={[styles.accordionButton, styles.accordionHeader]}
+                  onPress={() => {
+                    // Handle accordion header press here
+                  }}
+                >
+                  <View style={styles.meAuto}>
+                    <View style={styles.headerInner}>
+                      <Text style={styles.projectName}>Project name here</Text>
+                      <Text style={styles.status}>
+                        Status:
+                        <Text style={styles.statusBadge}>In Progress</Text>
+                      </Text>
+                      <Text style={styles.priorityBadge}>High</Text>
+                    </View>
+                  </View>
+                </TouchableOpacity>
+                {/* The content inside the collapsed section */}
+                {/* Replace <TaskList /> with the actual component */}
+                <View style={styles.accordionBody}>{/* <TaskList /> */}</View>
+              </View>
+              {/* ))} */}
+            </View>
+          </View>
+          <View style={styles.col}></View>
+        </View>
+      </View>
+    </View>
+  );
+};
+
+const styles = StyleSheet.create({
+  contentBody: {
+    flex: 1,
+    padding: 10,
+  },
+  container: {
+    flex: 1,
+  },
+  textHead: {
+    flexDirection: "row",
+    alignItems: "center",
+    marginBottom: 15,
+  },
+  heading: {
+    fontSize: 20,
+    fontWeight: "bold",
+    flex: 1,
+  },
+  addButton: {
+    backgroundColor: "#e45e38",
+    paddingVertical: 10,
+    paddingHorizontal: 15,
+    borderRadius: 8,
+  },
+  buttonText: {
+    color: "white",
+    fontSize: 16,
+  },
+  row: {
+    flexDirection: "row",
+  },
+  col: {
+    flex: 1,
+  },
+  accordionContainer: {
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: "#ccc",
+    borderRadius: 8,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+  },
+  accordionItem: {
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.125)",
+    borderRadius: 8,
+    marginBottom: 10,
+    width: "100%",
+  },
+  accordionButton: {
+    position: "relative",
+    display: "flex",
+    alignItems: "center",
+    width: "100%",
+    paddingVertical: "1rem",
+    paddingHorizontal: "1.25rem",
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: "#969ba0",
+    textAlign: "left",
+    backgroundColor: "transparent",
+    borderWidth: 1,
+    borderColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.125)",
+    borderRadius: 0,
+    overflow: "hidden",
+    transition:
+      "color 0.15s ease-in-out, background-color 0.15s ease-in-out, border-color 0.15s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.15s ease-in-out, border-radius 0.15s ease",
+  },
+  accordionHeader: {
+    marginBottom: 0,

+  meAuto: {
+    flexDirection: "row",
+    justifyContent: "space-between",
+    alignItems: "center",

+  headerInner: {
+    flexDirection: "row",
+    justifyContent: "space-between",
+    alignItems: "center",
+  },
+  projectName: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    fontWeight: "bold",

+    color: "black",

+  statusBadge: {
+    marginLeft: 2,

+    color:"#fc410c",

+    paddingVertical: 2,
+    paddingHorizontal: 2,
+    borderRadius: 40,
+    borderWidth:0.25,
+    borderColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.125)",
+
+  },
+  priorityBadge: {
+    fontSize: 14,
+    color: "blue", // Change to the desired color

+  accordionBody: {
+    padding: "1rem 1.25rem",
+    backgroundColor: "white",
+    borderBottomLeftRadius: 8,
+    borderBottomRightRadius: 8,
+  },
+});
+
+export default Task;
